word: The disciples were not intimidated or cast down by this treatment. . . . The God of heaven, the mighty Ruler of the universe, took the matter of the imprisonment of the disciples into His own hands. . . . By night the angel of the Lord opened the prison doors and said to the disciples, "Go, stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life" (Acts 5:20) (The Acts of the Apostles, pp. 77-80).
